page.title: 07Farming
page.content: { Except for the S.E. area,our block consists of farms,40-100 acres in size where the owners have lived for many generations.There are{DAIRY FARMS}and those engaged in{BEEF CATTLE}rearing, {MIXED FARMING,}or a mixture of these. Most of the farmers breed or work with {HORSES}as a hobby.Ponies,jumpers,race- horses and hunters are in evidence. On one big{DAIRY FARM},the herd 'keeps' the horses.The family show the ponies at Horse Shows,do 'eventing'and ride with the local Hunt.The mother of the family said, "Don't let me hear you children say a word about Blood Sports.The horses love it!". "But what about the foxes?" we said. "Oh! We seldom catch any of those-and I've been hunting for twenty years!". said she,striding along,us in tow.
